code: import React from"react";import"./testimonials.css";import{Data}from"./Data";import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from"swiper/react";import"swiper/css";import"swiper/css/pagination";import{Pagination}from"swiper/modules";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Testimonials=function Testimonials(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"testimonials container section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"My tutors said"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{className:"testimonials__container",loop:true,grabCursor:true,spaceBetween:24,pagination:{clickable:true},breakpoints:{576:{slidesPerView:2},768:{slidesPerView:2,spaceBetween:48}},modules:[Pagination],children:Data.map(function(_ref){var id=_ref.id,image=_ref.image,title=_ref.title,description=_ref.description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SwiperSlide,{className:"testimonials__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"testimonials__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"testimonials__name",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonials__description",children:description})]},id);})})]});};export default Testimonials;
